poem:
"Chorus Unfinished"

The singer's song, unspent, 
In his age's twilight,
Vibrates in the silent air;
The notes now a lingering fragrance.
Tomorrow's Spanish sun, unseen
and the last note unwritten.
Love echoes in remembered refrains;
always the same, 
always love.
